item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

First, Search forpublic void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

If thatâ€™s not findable, look for this in the beggining of the scriptpublic class client extends Player implements Runnable {
Then add this after the runnable statement.[code]public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2)+(orientation&3));
}[/code]

To add a object, add AddGlobalObject(absX, absY+1, 6045, 0, 0);
Preferably by command or at the process()

Read full topic
